<h4>Bio</h4>

Tom Wheeler is a web developer and energy data analyst with a master's of environmental science & management from the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management. Currently developing a [dashboard](https://tbwheeler94.github.io/posts/2023-02-10-energyexplorerio/) to calculate the future economic value of utility-scale solar with battery projects in California, Tom is excited about enabling renewable energy deployment and better grid management with DERs. In his most recent role as a Software Developer for the Industrial Sustainability Analysis Lab, Tom advanced the development of a data visualization dashboard (scheduled for public release in summer 2023) to help international climate policy-makers and data center energy modelers better understand trends in data center energy use by the top 50+ global technology companies.
